name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A spicy stir-fry dish made with chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and Sichuan peppercorns.

name: Peking Duck
description: A famous Beijing dish featuring crispy roasted duck, served with thin pancakes, scallions, and sweet bean sauce.

name: Dim Sum
description: A style of Chinese cuisine where small portions of a variety of dishes are served in steamer baskets or on small plates.
